segments.text: This is Doris . Who's calling please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi , Doris , this is Mike calling from Parker's Dentistry . I'm calling to confirm your appointment for tomorrow morning at 9 am with Dr.Parker .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I almost forgot . Thank you for calling to remind me . Actually . I do need to change the time of my appointment . I have a scheduling conflict . And I can't make it that early .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If I put you in at a later spot , would that work out ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It would have to be after lunch . Do you have anything available about 2 o'clock ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry ma'm , the only opening we have after lunch is one fifteen , but I might be able to work you in after 4 . would that be a better time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That â€™ s alright , . I think I should be able to make it at one fifteen . Can you put me down for that time slot ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . I have you appointment changed from tomorrow morning to tomorrow afternoon at one fifteen .
segments.speaker: S2
